headline: Ohio mapmakers OK 2nd congressional map over Dem objections
author: Associated Press
sentences: COLUMBUS — Republicans on the Ohio Redistricting Commission sent an adjusted map of congressional districts that delivers two-thirds of the seats to their party back to the state’s high court on Wednesday.
They began the hearing by offering their own, more closely divided map — and then a series of four targeted amendments aimed at ...
Frustrated Democrats again opposed the latest plan, which is subject to Ohio Supreme Court review.
